story:
THE PROMISE

 

WHY IN ISRAEL?

Obviously, our Team has personal ties with Israel, but also with other many countries.

There was also THE VISION, to make possible “the return of the exiles” and “the blossom of the desert”, a hard job anyway.

But in the other hand, it’s well known that Israel is a pioneer country in Eco-Technologies and encouraging  the creation of start-up projects.  Giving support to all kind of Green Tech- Clean Tech and environment preserve initiatives, changing their politics in order to make it easier.

As a Private Business Initiative Project we have agreed with the State of Israel the following points:

  -   Support to the infrastructure and civil construction.

  -   Fiscal Benefits for 10 years.

  -   Funding for new industry establishment.

  -   Designating a general coordinator between the Project and the different Ministries.

  -   Technical support in different areas : urban planning, security, etc

 

WHY TO SUPPORT THE PROJECT?

We don’t want only your donation, we want you to be a part of it!! And be proud of your perks.

With your generous contribution, you will make possible THE VISION and the world a better place to live.

HAZON AIN-Israel it’s the Pilot Project to show that’s possible an Eco Smart City with a sustained profit growth.

 

Discover HAZON AIN !!!

A DOOR TO THE FUTURE !!!

 

HAZON AIN, ECO SMART CITY

IN THE NEGEV

 

Be a part of a new generation of cities, giving support to the creation of a totally Eco-sustainable, in harmony and balance between people, environment, architecture, technology and nature. Devising and developing future cities today.

 

 

 

 

 WORKING FOR AN ECO-FRIENDLY LIVING!

 

 

 

 

 

THE BEGINNING 

 

​

 

 

 

 

 

HAZON AIN, A VISION, A REALITY

All the information and feasibility of the Project's success has been based on the last 4 years meetings held with different Agencies, Departments and Ministries of the Kneset, to make the project a solution to the problems and real needs of Israel.

These requirements are summarized in the following objectives:

- Job creation, through the installation of foreign non-polluting industries and industries for technological development and also a Tourism Project.

- Offering affordable smart homes to young people and couples.

- Eco-sustainable infrastructures to give housing and work solutionsto a Aliyah (jewish immigration).

 

To achieve these goals, we have developed the following actions:

 

Tourism - Cultural Singularity

"The Memory of our Roots"

 

First in the world where will be located a city of Vacations “Sephardi Park Resort” hotels, apart hotel and bungalows with a total capacity of 4.500 rooms, playful and vacation set spaces and remembering the epoch of the Sephardi Diaspora, with zones and spaces representing the principal jewish quarter of  Sepharad (Toledo, Códoba, Gerona, Granada etc.).

 

 

A Leisure oasis in the middle of the dessert,

for the families.

 

 

20.000 m2 commercial and leisure area, with stores, restaurants, coffee shop, cinemas, playground, supermarket,  etc. 

A sealed dome, recreating the Mediterranean climate with a constant temperature and humidity.

 

HERE´S WHERE YOU COME IN 

LAUNCH OF THE HAZON AIN INTERNATIONAL CAMPAIGN

International Promotion Campaign:

  1. Create the Genesis Foundation
  2. To give visibility to the Project
  3. Investors search for seed money and Phase 1
  4. Search for Industry and Companies to locate
  5. Creation of an administrative infrastructure

 

THE FOUNDATION

 

 We will create the Genesis Foundation, to give a legal framework to offer total transparency to all our benefactors.

Initially, the main purpose of the Foundation it’s to manage the donated funds, but in the future there will be other important purposes, in order to give economic support to:

  -   Families with low income

  -   Scholar and University Grants

  -   Support to the Start up

  -   R+D Development for eco-technology

 -   Promote and cooperate with Humanitarian Projects 

 

 

HAZON AIN TEAM ACHIEVEMENTS UNTIL NOW

We dreamed about HAZON AIN four years ago, a long way walked.

There’s so much work done during the last years, with an investment over 300.000 $.

  -   Feasibility Study

  -   Market Research

  -   Business Plan

  -   Green and Clean Tech companies research

  -   Project’s Presentation to the different Ministries of the State of Israel

  -   The creation of an Architecture and Urban Design Department

It wasn’t only a dream, it has become a reality.

 

PROJECT’S PRESENTATION:  Depending on the amount we raise, we might be able to increase the places where we will do the presentations, or even more, the beginning of the Project.

Goal 20,000 $

  1. First Marketing campaign
  2. creation of a WEB
  3. Updated Video Presentation and the Project Release in several countries and media positioning  

Goal 40.000 $

Spain and Israel Presentation

  1. Press conference
  2. Presentation to Institutions and Associations
  3. International Meetings

Goal 60.000 $

Creation of the GENESIS Fundation

Goal 80.000 $

USA and Canada Presentation

Goal 120.000 $

Latin America Presentation

Goal 170,000 $

Guide of the Urban Project

Goal 520,000 $

Urban Master Plan

Goal 920,000 $

Urban Special Plan

Study of detail

Goal 1.920.000 $

Basic Project

Marketing Plan

 

HOW TO KEEP ME  INFORMED ABOUT THE PROJECT PROGRESS?

One of our first purposes , It’s to create  a Newsletter addressed to all our donators and with the  up-to-date on all the different areas of the Project.

We will also share you by e-mail  information about:

-          Upcoming Presentation. Place and Date

-          Press Releases

-          Perks- when and how you will get them.

 

KEEP THE PROJECT ALIVE IN SOCIAL MEDIA!!

Help us to spread HAZON AIN,  herewith you will find a few material from the Project’s Presentation.  Please, feel free to share it with your family, friends and contacts.

  -   Link to The Video Presentation

  -   Link to the HAZON AIN - THE VISION Presentation 

  -   Link to the HAZON AIN - LA VISION Presentación en Español

  -   Link to the HAZON AIN ECO SMART CITY IN THE NEGEV Presentation

  -   Link to the HAZON AIN ECO SMART CITY IN THE NEGEV Presentación en Español

  -   Link to HAZON AIN - NEGEV PROJECT Facebook page

We  uploaded the Video Presentation on the HAZON AIN’s Facebook page, and has registered over 15,000 views in less than a week.

 

CALL FOR INVESTORS, COMPANIES AND INDUSTRY

Perhaps, who knows, there’re some Investment Groups out there interested in our Project or also Tech-Companies and Industry that wants to establish themselves in the HAZON AIN Industrial Park and Business Center.

In that case, please don’t hesitate and contact us, you will find all the support and help of the HAZON AIN TEAM.

 

ABOUT US

THE HAZON AIN TEAM started a few years ago, sharing The Vision and dreaming to make it possible. We do believe in our capacity to change the world.

Our Team grows, at the same time that become professionalized in the different areas.

 

WE WILL KEEP ON WORKING HARD, STEP BY STEP, TO REACH OUR DREAMS, TO REACH THE VISION.

 

THANKS TO ALL OF YOU!

story:
Who Are Hoes for Hillary?

Hillary Operatives Engaging Strategically, otherwise known as HOES, aim to inspire the Citizens of United States to vote, not for who Hillary is, but for what she believes in and her stance on important issues (and to do so in an engaging manner). 

Beyond this, we're making fun of this election and it's media portrayal through t-shirt art. You can see more about the issues we care about on our website: hoesforhillary.us

Goals of HOES

Hillary Operatives Engaging Strategically have the following goals:

  • To raise awareness of Hillary's stance on important issues that are in precarious positions; to help people better understand the consequences if they do not vote for Hillary. You don't have to care about all these issues--just one of them will do.
     
  • Perform outreach to the Bros for Bernie who are burnt out on Hillary. You may not like who she is, but your vote could mean that your freedoms are protected, and that the change you would like to see in the world actually happens.
     
  • Encourage people to vote by through t-shirt advertising and creating plans for voting--finding their polling location and making an appointment on peoples' calendars
     
  • To raise the amount of money that we would like to donate to the Hilary campaign but do not currently have budget to do so.

Please note: Hillary has no knowledge of and has not endorsed this campaign. It is completely rogue. However, all profits made will be donated to the Hillary campaign.

Our T-Shirts

We have created the following t-shirts to raise awareness of the mission and also to generate  the amount we would like to donate:

CAPITOL HILL
 

Capitol Hill was designed to underline the importance of this election. There are many important issues at stake. We would like to take away the spotlight from details about Hillary as a person, and focus on her stance on issues.  

Want to know more about this issues we think are most important? Go to hoesforhillary.us

Can't Dance. Loves Pants.

Our Can't Dance, Loves Pants t-shirt reflects the constant media barrage of facts about Hillary that try to distract Americans from more important issues at stake (Exhibit A). We too have bad dance moves and have been known to wear the same outfit twice, but that doesn't affect our ability to do our jobs. We encourage people to vote for Hillary because of her stance on issues and her history of executing on things she cares about, and that's all.  

Hoes for Hillary

Stand with us, and show that you're standing with us, with your very own Hoes For Hillary t-shirt.  

Hills for Hill

This t-shirt represents the nuanced challenge represented by the fact that Hillary is a woman. There are clear double-standards in the media that she must overcome, explained here. This t-shirt makes fun of the social construct placed on women, and encourages the rest of us women to stand with her.

Make America Slutty Again

This t-shirt represents the fact that Trump is offering partnership with Russia in order to enhance his own financial gain. See more information here. 

Have any more questions? Please email us at hillaryhoes@gmail.com or visit our website: hoesforhillary.us

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks that you will not receive a t-shirt. Due to working with third party vendors, there is a slight risk in delay. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Donate directly to this Hillary Campaign in our name at https://www.hillaryclinton.com/donate/.

story:
I am a mother of 4 and my youngest is 3 months old. I am very familiar with the constant fear of SIDS and I know of many more parents out there just like me with the same concern. SIDS is the #1 leading cause of infant deaths in the Unites States and my heart breaks for parents when I hear a news story about another infant who died suddenly while they were supposed to be safe in their crib. I refuse to believe that I am the only mother who checks her baby throughout the night to make sure she’s still breathing. I know I’m not the only parent whose biggest fear is going to reach for my baby only to realize the horror of finding my baby died while I was sleeping. I don't believe any parent should have to go through the pain of losing their baby, but it happens every day.  There has to be a way to help and I think I can.

 I've come up with an idea that I believe will drastically reduce the risk of SIDS based on research that has already been done. I’ve already discussed the idea confidentially with a well-known and reputable company that will help me with the process of getting it designed and patented. Unfortunately, the answer to everything is always money, everything my husband and I work for goes to caring for our family. I want this project to keep moving forward and in order to do that, I need help with the initial cost of $795 to begin the design process.  

I want to share this with everyone and the sooner I can raise, the funds, the sooner I’ll be able to share my idea. I’m very excited and I can’t wait to see this idea come to life. I know that with help from generous people who share my excitement, this can become a reality. If it saves even one life (and I’m confident it will save many more) it is going to be worth every ounce of effort everyone involved. Please come share this journey with me! Even if you can’t contribute, you can help spread the word.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Mark Laymon and Caffeine Spaces is a network of coworking spaces I am launching for the local tech community. I would like you to be a part of this project from the very start!

For the past three years I have hosted tech related events. Each event is focused on a different type of niche. Our monthly attendance varies from 30 to 125 attendees. One of the main requests I receive from the members is for a full time location for them to call home for their mobilized businesses. I am submitting this crowdfunding campaign to accomplish two goals. One is to offer a highly reduced membership plan for the members prelaunch of our opening day. Two is to cover some of the basic costs for desks, chairs, and tables.

We have a lot of renovation to complete before we open. Carpets need upkeep, walls need to be adjusted, and with new walls we need new paint! To cover the minimum requirements is our priority at this time. This allows us to have a clean and friendly location for everyone to enjoy.

I want to send a special Thank You to the Enterprise Development Corporation and the Research Park at Florida Atlantic University! With the help of the EDC and Research Park we are now able to make this location possible for us to launch our first location in South Florida!

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Why Coworking?
Is the coffee shop you are working at discouraging you from squatting all day at one of their many tables? You bought at least one of their overpriced drinks didn't you? Having an affordable and welcoming coworking space is my solution.

The local coffee shop I have worked at for the past year has gone so far as to cover their power outlets! What about renting an executive office space for your startup? Do you want to have a one year contract for a company that may only take 90 days to launch? What will you do with the office with the remaining nine months? Is your lease transferable? Maybe you should stay at home? You don't mind having clients see your laundry do you? These are just a few things you need to contemplate before you decide to join a coworking space.

What is Coworking?
Basically, coworking or shared office spaces are arrangements that a business owner makes with a building owner to share the office space and resources. See http://coworking.com/ and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coworking

What we are creating is as close to a professional business clubhouse as possible. All the amenities of a large office are included, but none of the overhead.

Caffeine Spaces is developing a community driven office space to help like minded individuals that want to work in a group environment, achieve economies of scale without being a big company and enjoy being open and part of the community that value collaboration, openness, community, accessibility and sustainability. But this is just the beginning of what Caffeine Spaces is offering.

Becoming a coworking member is much more than renting a desk, it is joining a community of like minded individuals that want to work in a group environment, but still have the flexibility of working for yourself.

Caffeine Spaces is the first step many will take out from their home based business office. We cover this niche with multiple ways for the worker to become comfortable going out on their own, yet still have a community to fall back on when necessary. It takes very little out of pocket expense to become a coworker.

"Caffeine Spaces is created by Mark Laymon (that's me) to introduce coworking into the South Florida communities. As a work from home father, I ran across the day to day inefficiencies of not being in an office environment. Just the ability to collaborate my thoughts on a whiteboard to my peers would be enough to acquire an executive office space. Not to mention the ravaging effects of cabin fever from spending countless hours every day in one room was mind numbing. But the thought of a true executive office space was way more overkill than necessary for my work."

While attending several tech related social events in Miami I came across the Coworking movement. I could see there was something worthwhile for myself and my local peers to gather at a communal location, but still have individuality to work for ourselves.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

What are the funds we raise on IndieGoGo used for?
Desks, tables, chairs, printers, servers, high speed internet / wifi / router, projectors / screens, cleaning supplies, and all of the basic equipment that a coworking office needs to run efficiently. It is not going to financing the corporate structure, only decor and physical hardware.

What are the benefits to the community?
We a suffering a brain drain of tech startups and entrepreneurs in South Florida. By creating a network of coworking spaces I hope to have an impact in keeping more of the talent locally. Your support is key to this project. Without the local support and participation more of our local talent will be forced to migrate to other competing locations to ply their trades. Caffeine Spaces will create a minimum of 15 jobs at the Boca Raton location with many more in the future spaces. This creates an added value to each region we develop at.

Where are the Caffeine Spaces located?
Boca Raton will be the home for our first location. The space is 11,000 square feet. Our proposed seating arrangement is it have a mix of hot desks, fixed desks, and executive offices to be used on a day to day basis. Don't forget the phone booths to make those "private calls" private. We also will include a kitchen and several full sized conference rooms along with a pod-casting/green room. We are located in the Research Park of Florida Atlantic University.

3701 FAU BOULEVARD, SUITE 210
BOCA RATON, FL 33431


•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
The Rewards in Detail
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Pledge $5 or more
$5 is the minimum pledge amount that we are offering and it includes a day at Caffeine Spaces to meet other coworking enthusiasts and get the feel of our location. It is not a bad deal when you look at it. A normal day at a coworking space starts at about $25 and we are including a public Tweet from @CaffeineSpaces and recognition on our Facebook page to thank you for your support.

Pledge $10 or more
For only a $10 pledge we are opening our doors to you for three days! You still get the public Tweet from @CaffeineSpaces and recognition on our Facebook page to thank you for your support, a sticker for your laptop and a three day pass. Don't forget to share this page with a friend.

Pledge $20 or more
A $20 bill will get you a coffee mug and five full days to really get the feel of our venue and maybe you can catch a weekend or nightly event while you are visiting. You still have a sticker, a public Tweet from @CaffeineSpaces and recognition on our Facebook page to thank you for your support coming your way too!

Pledge $50 or more
Do you like T-shirts? For a $50 pledge you not only get a full week at Caffeine Spaces, but a sticker, a coffee mug, and an awesome T-shirt as well.

Pledge $150 or more
T-Shirt Sponsor - Our startup sponsor opportunity for you to be seen on both the t-shirts and a text link on our t-shirt sponsor page. We are printing t-shirts to be giving away at local events across South Florida and to each of our full time Caffeine members. For $150 your logo will be displayed on the back of our Caffeine Spaces t-shirts with a limit of 50 sponsors.

Pledge $800 or more
*** Startup Special $800 = 90 day passes! You do the math! ***
Are you a startup? Have more than two people on your team? I have special for you. 90 day passes for your company to share between yourselves.

Pledge $3,000 or more
24/7 Lifetime Membership - Become a power coworker! Have access to our coworking spaces 24 hours a day any day you want to work. No you can't move in, but you can work straight through the night on those difficult projects that require your utmost attention. We will also toss in a sticker, a coffee mug, and an awesome T-shirt. Limited to 50 lifetime memberships.

Pledge $5,000 or more
24/7 Lifetime Membership for TWO!!! Plus you get two stickers, two coffee mugs, and two awesome T-shirts to show your support of Caffeine Spaces. I think you also deserve 100 day passes to give to your friends to join you while you work! Limited to the first 20 pledges at this level.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Why are we asking for only $18,500 in pledges when it costs more to launch?
This is the bare minimum to purchase the hardware and décor needed to open our network of locations. But this is just a start in our fund raising goals. Each time we reach a goal in pledges the lower our overall costs will be to complete the launch. It also gives our future members a way to prove their support in our community. The ultimate goal for us to reach is $100,000. Reaching the ultimate goal will lower fundraising time from our schedule and we will incorporate that time into future growth, plus it reduces the overall fees required from our members. The more funds we raise from this CrowdFunding campaign the lower we can set our membership rates.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

*NOTE: Funds raised via CrowdFunding will NOT be used to finance the operations. They will be used to supply and furnish a dedicated coworking space that the members of the tech community can utilize.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Thank you to Turnstone for making a great informational video. http://www.youtube.com/user/turnstonefurniture

Thank you to the New Tech Community members for helping to promote our project.

If you donate, be sure to sign up for our newsletter on our website. Also, be sure to follow us on Facebook and Twitter for updates and our progress.

What about Coworking Florida?
I have renamed the project Caffeine Spaces and it is now under the Caffeine umbrella. The name Coworking Florida limited us from future growth in other geographic locations.

http://caffeinespaces.com

http://facebook.com/CaffeineSpaces

story:
AccommoDate encourages exploration and creativity. We provide a date planning resource based on your budget.

Any budget.

AccommoDate is a service that let’s you look like a sophisticated, master of your surroundings. We comb through all the best sources of events and bundle them together into a well-rounded date idea that fits within your price point. 

Start your experience with AccommoDate using your PC or smart phone and create your profile based on your specific tastes and your geographic location. AccommoDate clues you in to the areas hottest events, everything from: gallery events, scenic walks, sporting events, live music or a fine night at the theater. 

Please tell all your family and friends about this exciting project.

Post about it, tweet about it, talk about it, write about it, gossip about it. 

To thank you for all your wonderful support, please chose a perk from the column on the right. Keep the support coming. 

All of the proceeds to accommoDate will go to a local charity. 

 

======================================================

This small business is a graduate school project for a business class at California College of the Arts in San Francisco. We are building a business from scratch and need your support. Please pledge any amount of money (even those teeny amounts) and feel great about helping students reach their goal.

story:
We, The People's Choice

Gabriela Saucedo Mercer strongly promotes and supports JOBS, GOD, Family, Pro-Life, Conservative Values and Our United States Constitution.

Supports Small Business, Less Government, Less Taxes through Fair Tax (NO MORE Federal Tax Deductions for anyone), Education, Balanced Budget Amendment, Secure Borders, Legal Immigration and Term Limits.

She is an intelligent, well spoken (English and Spanish) naturalized citizen. She is a wife, mother, grandmother and small business owner.

She wants to represent "We The People" and NOT special interests and lobbyists.

Her daughter is a proud member and Staff Sergeant in the United States Marine Corps.

She desperately wants to change the rampant corruption of special interests and lobbyists that do not represent the American People. She is sick of what is happening in local, state and federal government. She, with our help, will do something about it.

Help her replace the co-chair of the progressive congressional caucus, the left-most socialist, Obama supporting member of congress, Raul "Boycott Arizona" Grijalva.

Her first VIRAL VIDEO in support of Arizona SB1070 in front of the Tucson City Council (She starts at the 1 minute mark): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ShkpO9Rf1bo&feature=player_em

This National Grass Roots Campaign will help get her elected. Even a "Hi $5" is much appreciated! Thank you.

story:
Hi, I’m Sara Schoonmaker and I have been volunteering for over ten years at the Nicaraguan Mission Project.  I started volunteering with my grandma who has been volunteering for twenty years .

The woman behind this mission is a true inspiration. Thirty three  years ago Ann Marie Zon began the Nicaraguan Mission Project to help the poorest of the poor in that country. The project located in Buffalo, New York is made possible by  dedicated volunteers who give freely of their time to organize and pack donated items, all of which are much needed.  After arrival in Nicaragua Ann’s volunteers distribute the boxes.

We need $32,500 to build the first playground in the area of Rivas Nicaragua! Children from many villages will be able to gather and play as children should. All funds will go to benefit the children. If we don’t meet our goal the money will go to fund ongoing established children’s projects including the children’s food kitchen, the cow project for providing milk, and sending children to school for education. If you are interested in learning more about these existing projects go to www.projectnica.org.

This playground will have a huge impact on children who only know work and poverty. Children playing is not typical. Little kids watch other kids work, or they are gathering water and firewood for their family. With this playground they can intermingle and play like kids.

 The Impact:

 Joy  and  Laughter are immeasurable!

 Other Ways You Can Help:

 If you can’t help us monetarily, help us spread the word via Facebook, Twitter, E-mail. Maybe someone else can donate. Every dollar counts! Your contribution no matter how small or large will help us reach our goal for the children.
story_txt:
Hi, I’m Sara Schoonmaker and I have been volunteering for over ten years at the Nicaraguan Mission Project.  I started volunteering with my grandma who has been volunteering for twenty years .
The woman behind this mission is a true inspiration. Thirty three  years ago Ann Marie Zon began the Nicaraguan Mission Project to help the poorest of the poor in that country. The project located in Buffalo, New York is made possible by  dedicated volunteers who give freely of their time to organize and pack donated items, all of which are much needed.  After arrival in Nicaragua Ann’s volunteers distribute the boxes.
We need $32,500 to build the first playground in the area of Rivas Nicaragua! Children from many villages will be able to gather and play as children should. All funds will go to benefit the children. If we don’t meet our goal the money will go to fund ongoing established children’s projects including the children’s food kitchen, the cow project for providing milk, and sending children to school for education. If you are interested in learning more about these existing projects go to www.projectnica.org.
This playground will have a huge impact on children who only know work and poverty. Children playing is not typical. Little kids watch other kids work, or they are gathering water and firewood for their family. With this playground they can intermingle and play like kids.
 The Impact:
 Joy  and  Laughter are immeasurable!
 Other Ways You Can Help:
 If you can’t help us monetarily, help us spread the word via Facebook, Twitter, E-mail. Maybe someone else can donate. Every dollar counts! Your contribution no matter how small or large will help us reach our goal for the children.

story:
Short Summary:

The Denver Community Health Collective is a low cost, volunteer run clinic offering alternative health care in Central Denver. We are dedicated to providing holistic, accessible and affordable health care to our communities.

Our Story:

We started DCHC in response to an overwhelming need in our community for health care. Our community of friends and neighbors are mostly uninsured, and going to the ER for things like chronic headaches, sprains, and most of all stress, is just not an option. We have also worked with many people who after having discriminatory and traumatizing experiences in western medical facilities about their gender, race or class status, simply do not feel safe in healthcare settings anymore. So we look to eachother, ask around, or just live with the pain. Since most of us healers were in school, had jobs, kids and busy lives, we thought we would try to consolidate the work we were doing with friends by making sundays a health day in our basement! In the last 2 years we have since moved from the basement to a warehouse in the 27 social center, and finally to our clinic we have now, an actual office with doors, carpet and windows!

 

What We Need & What You Get:

We need $6000 to launch our clinic into full time status! The $6000 will:

 

  • Pay rent and expenses for 3 months, which will:
  • Allow us to hire a community member to be our clinic director, who will run the clinic, set the appointments, do outreach to potential clients and volunteers, and set up classes, workshops and events throughout the year. Hiring her will allow us to:
  • Be open full time, starting at 4 days a week, with hopes of eventually 5 days a week.
  • Update our facilities. We have been using all donated and out of pocket supplies and furniture. We would like to be able to buy:                               -a new desk,                                                                                              -a larger filing cabinet,                                                                                 -a supply of oils, liniments, and new sheets,                                                  -a stock of paper towels, toilet paper, hand soap and cleaning supplies,           -outreach & advertising supplies, including fliers, posters and small ads
  • After 3 months we hope for the clinic to be fully self sustainable, even if every client only pays the minimum $10 on our sliding scale.

Our Services include:

  • Massage Therapy 
  • Acupressure
  • Traditional Aztec Medicine
  • Herbal Consultations
  • Doula Care
  • Craniosacral Therapy
  • Counseling & Psychotherapy Consultations
  • Support navigating low income health care/ hospital/ clinic systems

 

What do you get?

Besides having increased access to a wonderful community health resource, how 'bout those amazing perks?! Handmade amazing products, massages, and herbs!!

The Impact

Your contribution will let us be able to go from offering services 1 day a week to 4. We are currently able to provide about 6 appointments a week. With our new hours and paid position, we will be able to provide more like 24 appointments a week! And that's just to start. If things go well, we will continue to grow as much as we can. Not to mention expanding our herbal apothacary and workshop programs!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Times are tough, and don't we know it! If financially contributing today is not an option for you, don't fret, theres lots of ways to help!
  • Help us spread the word by clicking "share" on facebook, or copying and pasting this page's link to a personal email sent to your network of friends, family members and colleagues.
  • Volunteer with us! Check out our website below to learn about all of the fullfilling and educational volunteer oppurtunities we offer.

www.denverhealthcollective.com

 

For those Interested, we'd like to include our more detailed budget below:

  • Rent = 300$/mo x 3mo= $900 (We are lucky to have inexpensive rent!)
  • Utilities (Gas/Electric/Internet/Phone) = $50/ mo x 3= $150
  • Supplies for 3 months:

- Massage oil $28/gallon , liniments $20/ 2 bottles

- Natural Laundry soap $11

- Natural Hand Soap $25

- Toilet paper $36

- Paper towels $24

Total for supplies for 3 mo= $144

  • Labor (Office manager position)= $1500/ month x 3mo= $4,500
  • Outreach costs = $68 for 1000 flyers and posters. Not a regularly repeating cost.
  • Desk and filing cabinet = $120
  • Indigogo perk supplies= $50

Total= $5864

Our income:

Minimum cost per treatment = $10

Number of Treatments available per month being open 4 days a week = 96

96 treatments x $10 = $960

We are also renting out our treatment rooms to practitioners to cover the rest of the costs, at a slding scale rate of $50-100 per month.

In addtion, we are in the process of applying for comprehensive fiscal sponsorship with the Colorado Non-profit Development Center. View their website here:http://www.cndc.org/

With fiscal sponsorship, we will be able to apply for grants to fund our project more substantially.

Lastly, we will be doing ongoing fundraising as a big part of our work. Fundraisers in the past have been very successful! We've had a poker tournament, a pie night social, and seasonal potlucks. In the future we are planning to fundraise through community workshops,classes, dinners, bingo nights, and more!

 

For any more information, questions or comments, please email us at denver.healthcollective@gmail.com
